mapper.insert: insert into members(num, id, password, repassword, name, year, month, day, email, hp1, hp2, hp3, add1, add2, style, cat, age, gender) values(#{num},#{id},#{password},#{repassword},#{name},#{year},#{month},#{day},#{email},#{hp1},#{hp2},#{hp3},#{add1},#{add2},#{style},#{cat},#{age},#{gender})
